about.content:
I am currently completing a master's degree in computer science at the UTT (Universit√© Technologique de Troyes) in France.

I am deeply passionate about programming as I spend most of my time building things.
Currently, I am working on games, you can take a look at them below!

contact.email: Don't hesitate to drop me an email at

infinite-torpor.title: Infinite Torpor
infinite-torpor.sub-title: Dungeon Crawler made from strach in C++ using SDL.

modal.body:
Explore procedurally generated dungeons, fight back and try to find a way out!

This was a personal project with my little brother (game artist).

I built the game engine from scratch (game loop, collisions detection, buttons...), and developed game mechanics (combat system, enemies behavior...).
The game is procedurally generated based on hand-crafted rooms.

Made in C++ with only SDL2.

See the source code on Github
